title: Transition Plan Credibility Assessment
description: Comprehensive assessment tool for evaluating the credibility of organizational transition plans

sections.title: Red Flag Questions
sections.description: Critical questions that if answered 'No' result in Misaligned rating

questions.question_text: Does the organization have a documented net-zero transition strategy?
Has the organization set science-based targets for emissions reduction?
Does the organization disclose its current greenhouse gas emissions baseline?

sections.title: Accountability
sections.description: Questions that determine the base credibility score

questions.question_text: Are there clear governance structures overseeing the transition plan?
Does the organization report progress against transition targets regularly?
Are executive compensation packages linked to climate performance?
Has the organization established interim milestones toward its net-zero target?
Does the organization have third-party verification of its emissions data?

sections.title: Depth of Planning
sections.description: Questions assessing the comprehensiveness of the transition plan

questions.question_text: Does the plan include detailed sector-specific decarbonization pathways?
Are technology deployment scenarios clearly outlined?
Does the plan address potential risks and mitigation strategies?
Are capital allocation plans aligned with transition objectives?
Has the organization begun implementing specific transition initiatives?
Are there dedicated resources (budget, personnel) allocated to the transition?
Does the organization have partnerships or collaborations supporting the transition?
Are there measurable actions planned for the next 12-24 months?
